segments.text: I see the boy stretching as far as he can to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined and focused on his goal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool he's standing on is so unstable; it could tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel worried for his safety as I watch him balance precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently for her cookie, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman is still drying dishes, completely oblivious to the children's actions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is overflowing and creating a huge mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such a waste of water and the potential damage it could cause.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm and well-maintained compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the children should be more careful with their actions and the woman should be more attentive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for her to realize what's happening in her own kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
